channel.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Host on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Virtual_Host on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Virtual_Host
item.description: SoftLayer_Virtual_Host Service Datatype Description The virtual host represents the platform on which virtual guests reside. At times a virtual host has no allocations on the physical server, however with many modern platforms it is a virtual machine with small CPU and Memory allocations that runs in the Control Domain. Local accountId A virtual host's associated account id Type: integer createDate The date a virtual host was created.
